trial_identification.studytitle: The effects of the amount of perioperative fluid given in septorhinoplasty surgery on postoperative edema
trial_identification.scientifictitle: The effects of the amount of perioperative fluid given to patients undergoing elective septorhinoplasty surgery on postoperative edema

conditions.healthcondition: fluid treatment and edema in septorhinoplasty

interventions.interventions: Septorhinoplasty surgery follow-up forms of patients were retrospectively obtained for duration of surgery, patient age, height, weight and other demographic characteristics, induction and maintenance used in anesthetics during the procedure, perioperative systolic and diastolic arterial pressures and heart rate, and the perioperative amount of fluid given. Edema and ecchymosis score at 1 hour, 24 Hours, 7 days and 10 days were obtained. The degree of edema was assessed by 4 degree scale and ecchymosis was assessed by 5 degree scale. This information was used to determine any relationship between the amount of perioperative fluid given and the occurrence and severity of edema and ecchymosis after surgery.

primaryOutcome.outcome: Edema at 1 hour and 24 hours post surgery assessed by 4 degree scale.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: At 1 hour and 24 hours post surgery

primaryOutcome.outcome: ecchymosis at 1 hour and 24 hours post surgery assessed by 5 degree scale.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: at 1 hour and 24 hours post surgery

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Edema at 7 and 10 days post surgery assessed by 4 degree scale.
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: At 7 days and 10 days post surgery

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Ecchymosis at 7 and 10 days post surgery assessed by 5 degree scale.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: patients undergoing septorhinoplasty surgery with ASA(american society of anesthesiology) score 1-2.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: patients treated with nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs and corticosteroids perioperatively.

sponsorship.primarysponsoraddress: Istanbul Research and Education Hospital Kasap Ilyas district Org.Abdurrahman Nafiz Gurman street Postal code:34098 FATIH/ ISTANBUL

ethicsAndSummary.summary: perioperative fluid treatment effects on postoperative edema and ecchymosis in patients undergoing septorhinoplasty surgery.
